paint.shared.io

Class ExperimentDataLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint.shared.io.ExperimentDataLoader

  • public final class ExperimentDataLoader
extends Object
    Provides centralized functionality for loading all experiment-related data: recordings, tracks, and (for mature projects) squares.

    The class orchestrates reading and schema validation of CSV files into structured Experiment objects. It leverages the specialized RecordingTableIO, TrackTableIO, and SquareTableIO classes to ensure consistent I/O and validation logic.

    This class is a static-only loader with a single entry point loadExperiment(Path, String, boolean).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static Experiment loadExperiment(Path projectPath, String experimentName, boolean matureProject)
      Loads an entire experiment from a given project folder.

    • Method Detail

      • loadExperiment

        public static Experiment loadExperiment(Path projectPath,
                                        String experimentName,
                                        boolean matureProject)
        Loads an entire experiment from a given project folder.

        This method sequentially performs the following steps:

        1. Loads and validates recordings.csv, converting rows into Recording entities.
        2. Loads and validates tracks.csv, associating tracks with each recording based on the “Recording Name” column.
        3. If matureProject is true, loads and validates squares.csv, mapping tracks into squares using the spatial boundaries defined for each recording.

        All CSVs are validated for column names, order, and data types according to schema definitions in PaintConstants.

        Parameters:
        projectPath - the root project directory
        experimentName - the name of the experiment folder (relative to the project path)
        matureProject - true to include square-level loading and mapping
        Returns:
        a fully populated Experiment object, or null if any data file fails to load or validate
